specs.value:
IP65 Front Panel
IP65 Report：Water Resistance：IP-X5，Dust Resistance：P-6X 
a.Inner Nozzle Diameter：6.3mm；   b. Water Speed：12.5±0.625L/min；
c. Water Pressure：Adjust according to water volumn；
d.Central part of water volumn ：A round with a diameter of about 40mm at the distance from the nozzle 2.5m.
e.Spray time in surface of panele: About 1 min/Square meter；f.Test time：at least 3min；
g.Distance between nozzle and panel surface：2.5～3m。
After test，there is no water leakage in sample.
